I guess that i have to post somthing on the fights going on between friends right now. I'm not following any one, I dont think this is the cool thing to do ("this" being writing livejournal entries about friends fighting). I just want to help friends...

<center> <b> As many of you can probably remember back to Tommy's party?? That was such a good night, everyone was having fun and being friends untill the drama broke out. And this highschool drama is wrecking all of your friend ships. It seems like no matter where I turn everyone is fighting, or posting livejournal entries about eachother. I dont understand it, why cant people just get along??? I remember at the beginging of last summer and this year everyone used to hang out in one big group, now people have broke off into sub groups (or thats what it seems like to me). If everyone could just understand that a friendship is an important thing, i think that we would all get along better. I know that im just posting this for no reason because no one reads my EL JAY...If you do read this, try to understand, be the better person and appologize to your so called "enemy" or "back stabber". do it you need to.



-kevin

today, sunday was the best day!!!

i got up and my mom made me and alex a huge breakfast, eggs, toast, bacon, the whole deal. I dropped alex off and talked to emily, we were going to the mall with eric and anna. when the time came, i picked her up at Victory and we drove to my house, then to the shoe store, and i returned my shoes for cash cus they sucked. After we met up with eric and anna at the mall. it was a prettty good time. We saw shawnee, tiff, matt, ellie there. they looked like they were having a good time, but we tried to stay away cus we really didnt wanna talk to them. Emily and anna, ( i do have to say) are insane shoppers, theyy see somthing and they grab it like vicious dalmations on a bone or somthing!!!! ahha!!
Emily bougt  new converse, a back pack, and a GUINT hat that is pretty cool. I forgot what anna bought. Eric and i bout drinks and pretzles mmmmm good. after the mall emily and i went to nuberrys to buy new back packs and try on goofy sunglasses haha!!!  we got lost listening to john lennon, but we finnaly found the sad cafe, and we went to see TBM but we ended up leaving, coming to my house and eating alot, then we took some pictures ( see below) and went on the computer....it was wicked fun the whole time and i know that all the people i hung out with are really good friends im so glad to have them!!! next weekend is probably gonna be just as good cus im going sking with emily and anna on saterday!!! YES!

<B> the weekend is finaly here. yes! Today there was a snow day, and i swear, so many people posted or said stuff like " Today was the BEST day ever!!!" So i guess it was!?!? I woke up at 9:00 and decided to do the drive way  with the snow thrower, because im cool like that. Then i came inside, ate  a breakfast, took a shower, called a mom, and got a lecture on why i couldnt go snowboarding with mike, I ended up going to Alex The Preists house with connor, jess townsend, and gilly (he was there for about 2 minutes). We went sleding at pinkerton ( so i guess i did really go to school). Afterwords we went back, had a mini jam session, then it was time to go home. I got home and I talked to Emily DiLo. 
Emily is a really good friend, I get along with her really good, 
and shes easy to talk to which is another good thing to.
 I think we talked for about an hour about everything.
Which is good because i havent talked to her in like 4444 years. 
We will be driving to The Sad Cafe on saterday together to see HARPER play. I love harper.
Ive never been in a car with " THE TWINS " , so this should be neat, 
 
I got ready for Ski Club tommorrow and now im here. 

WEEKEND PLANS

Friday: School, Skiclub, Sleeping at moms

Saterday: Dads, Nothing, Picking up the twins and going to see harper

Sunday: NOTHING


<3

<b> Today was actualy the first decent day ive had in along time.\

I woke up at 525, picked up mike, went to Dunks.

School comes next in the day, school was okay, my math teachers a faggot, what can I say though, math sucks right?

After School I dropped off mike, and then i slept. I woke up and had comment wars about calling eachother with Emily DiLo.

I dunno everyone fights all the time, 

but no one takes the time to notice that they have such good friends, I know when some one says they "FUCKING LOVE ME" < OB-V as a friend, it means alot... I just want 

people to recognize that they have a great group friends everyonce in a while. Sweet Deal




<3

Finaly im ready to go back to school, start a new year, it feels good. I survived another year. 3 more to go till i get out of this place, Thank the lord. Anyways if i missed anything from the two days that i was out please update me, id be glad to hear about it....im out, im going to go eat somthing for the first time in three days...ill leave you with 2 questions.... Should I cut it?????? or Keep It????

Hey everyone happy new years. Last night i had the greatest time with my best friend mike. I went to go pick him up at like 12 in the after noon and we ended up staying at his dads recording studio, helping his dad with recording some songs. After that i drove to mikes house and we picked up his clothes. Then we came to my house to drop his stuff off and we thought we were meeting eric st cyr to go to a party in manchesster but i guess that fell through so we went to <3Sams<3 house and chilled there for a bit and then we went to tiff's house but that was fucking gay cus i guess thats what you get for liking a 14 year old fresh man, what ever thats over so im glad. After tiffs we went to Wendys and did some cool shit there was this dog and its name was pookie and it was like 2 months old. We met up with matt and amanda there and we smoked up, it was great. There was this miget that had like a bottle of jack daniles and she was fucking trashed and she was puking all over the floor and she was making these noises that sounded like The Incredible Hulk.  And Every one was so chill there..  Mike and  Matt Klaw fought last night it was supposto be body shots but it ended up with mike punching matt in the face twice.
 Mikes fucking crazy.

<font size=11> <center> <font color=red> MERRY <font color= green> CHRISTMASS!!!!!!!!!!! <font color=red> EVERYONE!!!!!

<center> "Whatever happened to going to shows for the music? 
For the feeling you get when you are surrounded by kids that are all into the same thing? 
These shows are set up for kids like us who dont belong anywhere else. 
Obviously if you start some shit then you better be able to finish it, but by no means is something like this necessary. 
If you have a problem with someone then take care of it yourself. 
Its time we start embracing this so called "scene" and stop ripping it apart by severely beatin kids and shutting down venues. 
This goes out to everyone When you walk through the doors to a show, unless your heart and mind are open then you dont belong at all in fact you arent welcome. "
- This Was A  Direct Quote From Danny Of A loss for words

And I agree, the music isnt about 2 sepping or moshing!!! You go to a show to support your local or favorite band. I Dont like to go into school and see my friends (espically girls), bruised and broken from "the crazy mosh at the show last night"...Im sick of it, and im not directing this torwards any specific type of music, just ingeneral, so many of my friends are getting beat up and hit in the mosh or two step. No More Of This We really dont need it. we NEed to just be friendly....If you agree to what im trying to say then please comment, because there are kids in the hospital with brain diseases and fucked up skulls, from ass holes that like to kick kids asses.

 Why do people go to shows again? oh yeah, I forgot, to see the band they like and have fun and look up to who ever is on stage. I hope I am not the only kid that still looks forward to that when I purchase a ticket to a show. I don't expect this journal to create some huge movement, i dont expect it to change a thing, its simply my thoughts written down for everyone on here to see, please comment on this with brutal honesty on your thoughts, for or against mine. By the way this journal entry was not directed toward any specific "scene" it was directed towards everyone.

/but your never wrong.
- What has happend.....???

Wow, yesterday i got in a fight with my mom, to make a long story short, she slapped me and wrecked plans with me, amy, mike, and ellie, for the first day of vacation. How could this be happening. My mom was a total cunt for doing that, and now my friends are eating with out me, and im home alone, sitting here typing. its pretty fucking gay. I miss mike, but even more, I miss amy. This sucks big time. 
SO i guess im with tiff now??? OR atleast thats what ellie says and if some one wants to tell me whats happening or who im with thats fucked cus i didint even do anything, but what ever, belive what you must. um im fucking  bored and im going to go eat shit and die..so bye ill see you around later on.



-UKR

okay im sick of being like this, im tired of seeing people kiss and hug and make out and be so happy with eachother.
im fucking tired of couples rubbing it in by making out in public.
Im sick of My friends take away girls that i try to get in touch with. Im so sick of being single....this isnt a plead to get girls to,say "aww" or shit like that, you dont have any idea what i'm feeling ....ive been so alone for over a year now....and i dont know what happend, girls just stopped likeing me.....i dont know what to do...this is bringing my life down, my grades down....everythings going down the tubes....

alll im asking for is a decent relationship with a decent girl...not some scumbag slut...just a regular girlfriend....

-someone who cares for me

-some one who can come to my house and my moms not gonna think shes a coke attict...

-some one who can help me with  problems major or minor....

- some one who can talk to me about their problems

- some one who i can talk to late at night untill the early morning hours about everything

-some one whos not iin the relationship for the "ass" but for the love

honestly its not alot.....im really lonely...and sad...and depressed....

someone help me please :(

She lives in like East Kingston.....idunno where the hell that is?!!?!?!? but anyways, i got lost on my way home, and some drunk driver almost hit me, which was wicked scary....and i almost died but yeah.....whatever... that was my friday night......How was yours?

<center>1. How did you meet me?

2. When you met me what did you think??

3. What are my 4 favorite bands?

4. How messed up do you think i am? (on a scale from one to ten?)

5. How many sisters and brothers do I have?

6. Am i Nice to you?

7. Are we friends? Best friends? Good Friends?

8. What kind Of car or truck do i drive?

9. How do you judge me?

10. Whats the name of my band, and what do i play in it?

put on my overcoat and walked into winter - my teeth chattered rhythms
And they were grouped in twos or threes, 
like a morse code message was sent from me to me. 
cars on slippery slopes, they're stuck...
People pushing through their mittens as i was beginning to feel it soaking through my shoes,
 getting colder with every step i took to your apartment, dear. 

And i was a kaleidoscope... the snow on my lenses distorting the image 
of what was only one of you and i didn't know which one to address as all your lips moved. 

This is when i forget breathe all the things i scripted, they sound unfounded.
And the look that you're giving me, it tells me exactly what you are thinking...
"this ain't working anymore." 

They got their mothers worked into a panic
Sledding down hills into oncoming traffic
The parents layered clothes until the children 
couldn't move then kept them outside til their noises were blue and I got left there, too.

hey, im just basicly doing this to say sorry for what ever i have done through the long 2 years ive been in pinkerton. Recently alot of things have been happening to people, and peoples friends, i.e losing some one that they loved. and i know that i have acted like a jerk,fag,asshole,weirdo, sketchy, fucker, lameass, faggot, theres probably worse things that people have called me. but yeah im just writing tosay im not going to be like that any more im going to try to calm down and be my self and not be an ass, just to let you know i dotn want to lose anyone, and i dont want any one to lose anyone else. these times are pretty sad, and i know people are sad so if you know some one that has lost some one then please dont overwhelm them and just talk and be nice, because i think, no i know that they need it. im just writing to say im sorry if i did anything to anyone and im going to try to be in a better mood from now on......thanks.......peace, and love....

oh man last night (semi night) was the best night of my life,
I picked  up cady at 530 and then we drove to my house for pictures.
it was abou six fourty five when we left my house for semi, we waited for about 30 mintues and then i remembered that we  needed our id's for the dance!!!!
Cady didnt have hers so we called corey, eric, xtina, anna and asked them if they could pick hers up, they were already in derry and they had to get theirs too, so i went back to cadys and we werre there for like ten minutes and she came out and we sped back to derry 
(literally the whole time i was doing 60 in a 30 zone!!!) 

And we finnally got to pinkerton at like 7:58 (2 minutes to spare to get to the semi!!!) We sprinted into the Shepard building as quick as we could and got there right on time!

It was really prettty and stuff in the shepard auditorium.....and we danced for like 3 hours straight. it was so fun i danced with like everyone. 
So we get outta semi at like 10:15 and Corey R. , Xtina, Cady, Eric, DeRek, TOmmy, ME, and ANNA all went to  APPLE BEES for a reservation for Eight people under the name KEVIN ( me). and to find out that they dont do reservaitons so we waited for like 10 minutes untill the girl finnaly seated us. We got smoking section which was pretty cool cus ive never smoked in a resturant before. That was really fun and then we gott outta there at like 11:30 and the three cars drove back into hampstead (3 cars meaning my car, erics car, and dereks car)  So we drove to tommys house and waited there for like 10 mintues and i drove cady to her house to get some junk so she could sleep over  Xtinas house) I drove to Xtinas house and then drove to my house with eric) 

LAST NIGHT WAS DEFFENETLY THE GREATEST NIGHT OF MY LIFE SO FAR!!!!!!!

it was so fucking awsome i loved every minute of it, begining to end.

Any ways today i got up at like 12:00 and got a lecture from mom about coming home at 1::00 am!!!

ERic and i Did some fun shit and then went to Dunks for breakfast sandwiches.....

I aslo had a show friday that went okay.....


I also saw tHe pOlar eXpress today....it was okay but i was really tired and stoned so i didnt really get it.....



THANKS EVERY ONE THAT WENT WITH ME TO THE SEMI THAT WAS ONE OF  THE BEST NIGHTS IVE HAD......
